tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Healthcare_Provider_Schedule (
  provider_id INT NOT NULL,
  provider_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  schedule_date DATE NOT NULL,
  time_slot TIME NOT NULL,
  availability BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (provider_id, schedule_date, time_slot)
)

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_id INT,
  date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient_Records (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  patient_diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  appointment_date DATE,
  healthcare_provider_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (healthcare_provider_id) REFERENCES Healthcare_Providers(healthcare_provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  patient_id INT,
  healthcare_provider_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patient_Records(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (healthcare_provider_id) REFERENCES Healthcare_Providers(healthcare_provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT,
    patient_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE availability_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT,
    day_of_week VARCHAR(20),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE appointment (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    is_confirmed BOOLEAN
);
